page.title: 03BELLINGHAM HOTELS.
page.content: Bellingham's pub owners and landlords have remained in the same trade for several years.Local employees work only on a part-time basis as a rule.Beverages come from Newcastle but food products particularly meats,that is game and fish are bought locally when possible.The building of Kielder Dam has had little effect on summer trade,but visitors do still come to Bellingham in the summer which is the busiest time of year. All landlords/publicans expect a gradual change to take place in Bellingham. They all feel that Bellingham is a very pleasant place to live but they would all like better trading publicity in future.
